description: This notification is used for events that Hot Standby Group
status changes from one to another.

Summary.eval: ($v3 ne '') ? '$v3' : 'Hot standby group status changed from one to another'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwEsapHsbStatusNotification HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwHsbGroupId i 0 HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwEsapHsbBasicEventTime s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwEsapHsbBasicEventDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The time that the event occurred.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwEsapHsbBasicEventTime

description: A description of the event. The value of the object may
variables.name: HUAWEI-ESAP-HOT-STANDBY-MIB::hwEsapHsbBasicEventDescription
